page.title: 17CONSERVING NATURE ST.NINIANS
page.content: Our local{conservation group}(the SCV) has been working for 3 years helping their environment. The volunteers,with different backgrounds,do a{range of {work from fencing to pond creation}The skills to carry out these tasks have been built up over the years through training courses.In 1985 the group was working for Cambusbarron community council erecting posts to mark rights of way in the vicinity of the village. The group have also been asked to build stiles to protect fences belonging to the farmers whose land adjoins the rights of way .This task was undertaken because the community council felt that it would be encour- aging people to walk in a responsible manner.We have got a wildlife site in our area called{Polmaise Estate.}It's main points of interest are relict deciduous woodland and ponds.
